learnings.insight: i live everyday just randomly according to the whims of my thoughts, but that randomness is a part of me and I think accepting that and looking beyond it, by learning from it like using it as manure to grow a plant in my mind is the key to my growth now
Failure, regrets and disappointments help in setting up future direction to not repeat the same mistake and I am leaning into that
learnings.connection: related to my failure and disappointment of unrealised dreams, expectations from NITK and ASU

reflections.thoughts_reflections: alright, not too happy, but pretty stoked about building a CLI personal log

keyTakeaways: going to gym gives me mental piece and a sense of clarity, similarly with vipassana meditation as well
I'm really not sure what to do once I get a sense of clarity, my default reaction is to just default to my old self-sabotage thoughtless behaviors
actionItems: I will need to focus and clearly map out what can I do with much more mental clarity from gym, meditation
